snippet: The Times reporter Jeff Z. Klein has himself been the victim of a goal scored by a goalie.
abstract: The Times reporter Jeff Z. Klein has himself been the victim of a goal scored by a goalie.
lead_paragraph: A lot of people who have tried to play goalkeeper in soccer have come to know the sinking feeling of allowing a long-distance goal. I'm one of them.

headline.main: For One Goalkeeper, a Moment of Shame
